body: It's a little annoying that we can't do URLs like `/recipes/4/history/7` easily, yet that would be weird too because the ID 7 might not be a history item for recipe 4. Oh well. This is fine.
body_text: It's a little annoying that we can't do URLs like /recipes/4/history/7 easily, yet that would be weird too because the ID 7 might not be a history item for recipe 4. Oh well. This is fine.
